keys.string: As I knock on Danny’s door, he opens it with a grin on his face. He gestures me into the room, and he takes a seat back at his chair.
Thanks for the help the other day, [NAME]! I understood the lectures a lot, and I got full credit on that homework! I hope you enjoy that coffee by the way!
No problem! The coffee was a nice gift. So what are you doing?
Well, I’m just playing some League of Heroes again to rank up some more. Gotta keep it up, or else I get rusty! You wanna play?
I shake my head at his offer, and he frowns a bit. His frown is then replaced with a smile, and he refocuses his gaze onto his monitor. His match had started.

So you didn’t go out either, huh? Don’t feel bad! A night alone doesn’t have to be alone with the help of online chat clients! Besides, I prefer the quiet time here at the dorms when everyone is out. Easier to focus on gaming!
I get that. So are you winning?
Match just started, but it can swing into anyone’s favor depending on the teams and the players. Game of skill and all.
Alright, well, I’ll leave you to it then, Danny.
Danny stayed focused on the screen. I let myself out of his room, and closed the door behind me, making sure to lock it. I headed back to my room shortly after…

[Danny][Dialog]Thanks for the help the other day, [NAME]! I understood the lectures a lot, and I got full credit on that homework! I hope you enjoy that coffee by the way!
[Player][Dialog]No problem! The coffee was a nice gift. So what are you doing?
[Danny][Dialog]Well, I’m just playing some League of Heroes again to rank up some more. Gotta keep it up, or else I get rusty! You wanna play?
[Narrator][Dialog]I shake my head at his offer, and he frowns a bit. His frown is then replaced with a smile, and he refocuses his gaze onto his monitor. His match had started.

[Danny][Dialog]So you didn’t go out either, huh? Don’t feel bad! A night alone doesn’t have to be alone with the help of online chat clients! Besides, I prefer the quiet time here at the dorms when everyone is out. Easier to focus on gaming!
[Player][Dialog]I get that. So are you winning?
[Danny][Dialog]Match just started, but it can swing into anyone’s favor depending on the teams and the players. Game of skill and all.
[Player][Dialog]Alright, well, I’ll leave you to it then, Danny.
[Narrator][Dialog]Danny stayed focused on the screen. I let myself out of his room, and closed the door behind me, making sure to lock it. I headed back to my room shortly after…
